components.name: mgIesb
components.title: Tell us how the asset will be accountable to local people, and involve them in its running
components.hint: This means how you'll involve everyone in key decisions, such as how the asset is used.

components.name: lQEkep
components.title: Describe anything that might prevent people from using the asset or participating in its running
components.hint: For example, high membership costs or exclusive eligibility criteria which prevent people from participating.

name: Apply for funding to save an asset in your community
